casebody.data:
Block, Respondent, v. Mutual Fire Ins. Co., Appellant. (Common Pleas of New York City and County, General Term. November, 1889.) Appeal from special term.

Argued before Larremore, C. J., and Van Hoesen and Bookstaver, JJ.

Stine & Calman, for appellant. North, Ward & Wagstaff, for respondent.

No opinion. Ordered that the order be modified by striking out the words “when and where,” and in other respects affirmed, without costs of appeal.
